title: 2021 YT Capra is a Carbon MX 170mm enduro bike (there’s a new 29er too)
content:
Today sees YT Industries launch not one but two new enduro mountain bikes. The 2021 YT Capra, now the MK3, has arrived in two configurations; a 29er and a mixed-wheel size MX edition. The former is said to be the fastest enduro bike YT have ever made. Gone is the 27.5″ option, replaced by the […]

The post 2021 YT Capra is a Carbon MX 170mm enduro bike (there’s a new 29er too) appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
